THIS IS POSITIVELY THE BEST GAME IN HISTORY! The story telling is perfect, the atmosphere is spooky, the characters are deep, the fighting is fun, everything is done right! Play Half-Life 1, then immediately come play this. They are the two best games ever. It is worth the money!

Half Life 1 foi um dos jogos que mais marcaram a minha vida. Tive a oportunidade de jogá-lo na época do lançamento e toda aquela experiência foi incrível. Depois de mais de uma década, consegui jogar o segundo. E, puta merda, o jogo continua incrível. A história ainda é legal, a ambientação muito bacana e a jogabilidade fantástica. Esse é obrigatório na sua coleção.

I don't want to chew up too much of your time so I'll just list the pros and cons.

Pros:

-  Good graphics (considering the year it was made)
-  Awesome storyline and dynamic characters
-  As much story there is there is also plenty of action 
-  Is playable to younger people (you can turn off gore)
-  Doesn't cost that much


Cons:

-  A few glitches in lighting that can be fixed with console commands

What are you waiting for?  Get this game!  You wont regret it :D
Great game, great story, great graphics. It's a must have for every PC gamer out there.

E' un casino. Cioè nel senso te sei uno scienziato, fai scienza. E invece NO! Anni a studiare fisica quantistica in facoltà, e poi ti ritrovi con i fucili laser a fare "pium pium" ai ragni giganti, senza avere il porto d'armi o la licenza di caccia. E il brutto è che manco te li puoi mangiare i cosciotti di ragno gigante. Sicuramente qualche associazione animalista pro-ragni giganti si è incatenata a qualche palo e ha fatto in modo che ammazzare i ragni è scorretto, ma finche eserciti di esseri umani vengono a cercarti per spararti (poi perchè se devo salvare il mondo, mi sparano? cioè, mettiamoci d'accordo no? te dai na mano a me e io ne do una a te no?) te puoi ucciderne quanti te ne pare senza complicazioni psicologiche o sociali. Quelli magari avevano famiglia, una figlia piccola, una moglie premurosa.. E INVECE NO! Sono dei pezzi di merda che ti ammazzano. Morite male, bastardi.

Insomma, è un gioco bello.

Não o patriarca! más com certeza um dos pais do FPS – [B]HALF LIFE II[/B] – O REI. Esse incrível FPS foi uma revolução com o motor SOURCE – que realçou também nosso querido CS. Enredo fantástico!!! HL2 foi o primeiro game que me levou a um nível alto adrenalina – muita ação, muito rápido, levando ao limite da sobrevivência ao enfrentar um exército armado e organizado de aliens. Esse é o melhor enredo de FPS que eu já joguei; hoje, estou zerando novamente no hard e mesmo com as modernidades atuais, o HL2 ainda é INSUPERAVELMENTE MELHOR que muito jogo MILHONARIO por ai... Joguem!!!

play this, and understand why people legitimately STILL want HL3 even though, at this point, it's likely to be another duke nukem forever. that aside, HL2 is probably my favorite FPS ever and has a nice story that, though tying into the previous game, has a unique and fresh story that keeps most people intrigued, but is also "not there" enough to be ignored if need be in favor of the fun, smooth gameplay. mid-game-changeable difficulty as well, and "we don't go to ravenholm" is probably the best chapter in the game. honestly, I'd pay $60 for this game if I had to, which is made all the better by the fact that it's only $20 at full price anyway.

EDIT: valve teaching us to count in exciting and creative new ways. 1, 2, alyx

Описывать шедевральность этой игры нету смысла, по этому вот вам рецепт пирога

Яйца - 5 шт.
Сахарный песок - 1,5-2 стакана
Масло сливочное (растопить) - 150-200 г
Сметана - 1 стакан (200 г)
Сода (погасить уксусом) - 0,5 ч. ложки
Мука - 2 стакана (250-270 г)
Какао - 2 ст. ложки
(Объем стакана - 200 мл)
шаг №1

Яйца взбить с сахаром до белой пены.
шаг №2

Добавить просеянную муку, соду, растопленное остывшее сливочное масло, сметану и тщательно перемешать (лучше миксером).
шаг №3

Тесто разделить на две равные части. В одну часть добавить 2 ст. ложки муки.
шаг №4

В другую - 2 ст. ложки какао.
шаг №5

Перемешать, чтобы не было комочков.
шаг №6

Тесто должно быть консистенции негустой сметаны.
шаг №7

Широкую форму (26-28 см) смазать маслом. Вливать в центр поочередно небольшие порции разного теста (по столовой ложке). Не перемешивать!
шаг №8

В итоге должен получиться такой результат.

Выпекать пирог в предварительно разогретой духовке при температуре 190-200 градусов в течение получаса. Постоянно поглядывать... Если верх пирога уже пропечется, а середина еще нет - следует накрыть пирог фольгой, уменьшить температуру до 180 градусов и выпекать пирог до готовности.
Ито ЩЕДЕВААААР

If your looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if your looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:
1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie 

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing.

Half life 2, uno de esos juegos que son practicamente perfectos, cuyos errores se limitan solo a detalles minusculos, tanto que ni se notan. Sin duda alguna, uno de los mejores juegos de todos los tiempos, mezclando de forma inteligente distintos tipos de gameplay (survival horror, plataformas, shooter, etc) y narrando todo en tiempo real, todo con graficos que envejecieron muy bien al paso del tiempo.
Recomendado ahora y siempre

Short version:
- Got the game in 2004 with my ATI 9600 XT (actually just the activation code because it hadn't been lauched yet)
- Got a steam account
- Played and finished the game, once available
- Lost steam account
- Got back on steam 7 years later with new account
- Purchased it on sale anyway after 5 more years
- All is now right in the world...

Long version:
- Why are you still reading this, go get it! I purchased it AGAIN!

Not only a landmark in gaming, but it has also aged very well.
This is what FPS should be about: playability, story, graphics, in THAT order for those who can't get the 3 of them right.

PROS: Everything

I was quite amazed at how well this game seems to have aged. It has been over a decade since it came out and it looks better than some modern fps shooters. The story was very straightforward yet had left many questions unanswered. I seemed to have the right amount of ammunition at any time. The game seemed likethe God of War franchise; the reason being is that there were no 'loading screens'. 

The gameplay is extremly well balanced at almost all times.
Spent countless hours playing. By todays standards it is outdated but it was fun. I recomend it if one perspective buyer is into classics.

Nunca llegué a probar esta franquicia en mi infancia. De hecho, cada vez que escuchaba a mis amigos hablar entre ellos maravillas de estos juegos, mi curiosidad no hacía sino disminuir. Pero ahora que ha sido cuando realmente he podido experimentar sendas obras de [i] Valve	[/i], no tengo más que decir: Guau.

- Guau porque el despliegue técnico para un juego como fue éste de 2004 deja en evidencia a muchos otros grandes lanzamientos de la época.

- Guau porque aún habiéndolo completado me sigue asombrando la inteligencia del mismo y muchos de los momentos más intensos que he vivido surgieron sin "piloto automático", ni cinemática alguna.

- Y guau porque cumple al máximo su cometido de entrenerte y dejarte con ganas de más.

Muchas gracias, [i] Valve	[/i], por haber dado a luz esta gran obra.

P.D. ¡Pero sacad ya la tercera parte, que ahora comprendo el sufrimiento de tantos fans!
is very good game
